allow:
Bash(PRE_COMMIT_ALLOW_NO_CONFIG=1 git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: enhance pre-commit template with config file references

- Update pre-commit config to use external config files \(.flake8, .bandit, .pylintrc, pyproject.toml\)
- Add more hooks: autoflake, isort, pyupgrade, OCA hooks, xenon
- Match base-repo pre-commit style
- Update PRE_COMMIT.md with config file requirements and sources
EOF
\)")

Bash(PRE_COMMIT_ALLOW_NO_CONFIG=1 git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: move configs to base-repo, keep only workflows

- Remove configs/ folder \(now in base-repo\)
- Remove templates/ folder \(now in base-repo\)
- Update README to reference base-repo for new repositories
- Update PRE_COMMIT.md to reference base-repo for configs
- Simplify workflow-templates to point to base-repo

base-repo is now the template for new addon repositories.
github-actions contains only the centralized reusable workflows.
EOF
\)")
